txt.en: The leaders of the Orc and hobgoblin factions battling in Thyrstáth may not be able to defeat each other, but you are more than a match for them.
Use the summoning horn to call Hórin to your side.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin.
Call Hórin and talk to him

'The two leading the Orc and hobgoblin forces are known as Nargákh the Unyielding and Ufmazat the Overwhelming. They both think very highly of themselves, but I have seen them enter single-combat with each other several times, and it always ends in a draw, with both retreating.\n\n'I have a feeling you will be more than a match for them both!'
The leaders of the Orc and hobgoblin armies battle each other in Thyrstáth.\n\nYou should defeat Nargákh the Unyielding and Ufmazat the Overwhelming.
'Hah! \qThe Unyielding?\q \qThe Overwhelming?\q Neither was true!\n\n'How do they come up with these titles?'
